name: MoshiLetters
0:
”Alexa open moshi the monster”
”the letter is J”
”the letter is O”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: moshi the monster
des: Moshi the monster encourages children to learn their letters by "feeding" cookies to Moshi the Monster. Each time the child says the correct letter they rewarded by hearing Moshi eat the letter cookie. On all devices Alexa will say the sound of the letter and listen for the correct response. On the Echo Show, the child will also get to see the letter and Moshi waiting to eat it.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
